org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api

Interface FileCache

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanNameAware, ConfigurationElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.core.AbstractFileCache, PooledMessageFileCache, RAMDiskFileCache

    public interface FileCache
extends ConfigurationElement
    The public API of the temporary file cache implementations, a class implementing this MUST implement the FileCacheMXBean interface too, if the detailed MXBeans are required to be published

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.api.ConfigurationElement

        ConfigurationElement.State
